clear_history.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to clear the history?

pin_help.title: Help
pin_help.msg: There you can protect your session with 4-digit PIN. The session lasts 12 hours or until it will be terminated by explicitly logging out from the application. If you discontinue using the application for longer than 3 minutes, you will be prompted to enter the PIN again in order to continue the session. If you forget the PIN during the session, you can log out from the application, log in once again and use another one. Your PIN is stored locally, this feature is made for you not to have to type your long and secure password.

pin_skip.title: Skip PIN initialization
pin_skip.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to proceed without creating a PIN?
